what are we doing well? prompts for thin: I like that i can usually find solutions to new problems using online resources like the documentation and community support
what could we do better? prompts for thi: I'd like if there was an easier way to do math without making everything a list. I'd also like it if tiddler names in fields and other weird places could self update like tags do.
